name: Homonculus (Paxnarok)
description:
Everything was dark, and then...

The boy lighted his fire, thus his ordeal began...

Game Dev notes: 

  • Made in a team of 2, both working on code / assets /etc...
  • Game Engine: Unity
  • 3D Modeling: Blender
  • 3D Animations: mixamo.com
  • Music/Sound: Reaper + Free sound bank
  • 2D assets: Photoshop & Gimp
